Act Definition.0: An Act further to amend the Banking Companies Act, 1949.

paragraphs.0: This Act may be called the Banking Companies (Second Amendment) Act, 1960.
[Amendment of section 39.] Rep. by the Repealing and Amending Act (52 of 1964), s. 2 and the First Schedule (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).

Section 3..heading: Substitution of new sections for section 41.

paragraphs.0: [Substitution of new sections for section 41.] Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).

Section 4..heading: Substitution of new section for section 43A.

paragraphs.0: [Substitution of new section for section 43A.] Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).
[Amendment of section 44A.] Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).
[Insertion of new section 45.] Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).
[Amendment of section 45L.] Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).
[Amendment of section 50.] Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).
[Amendment of section 51.] Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 29-12-1964).

Section 10..heading: Certain winding-up proceedings to be governed by original provisions.

paragraphs.0: The amendments made in the principal Act by section 3 and section 4 shall not apply to, and in relation to, the winding-up of a banking company where any preliminary dividend has been paid in the course of such winding-up before the commencement of this Act, but the provisions of the principal Act as they stood immediately before such commencement shall apply to, and in relation to, such winding-up.
